response.original_title: Beethoven: Piano Concerto No. 5 / Rimsky-Korsakov: Scheherazade - Yefim Bronfman, Andris Nelsons & Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra at Lucerne Festival
response.overview: Andris Nelsons, Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra and Yefim Bronfman live at Lucerne Festival in the summer of September 5, 2011 at KLL Luzern Concert Hall  Andris Nelsons is one of the most sought-after young conductors on the international scene today and once again served notice of his extraordinary talent in Summer 2011 when he conducted two concerts with the Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra of Amsterdam at the prestigious Lucerne Festival.
response.title: Beethoven: Piano Concerto No. 5 / Rimsky-Korsakov: Scheherazade - Yefim Bronfman, Andris Nelsons & Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra at Lucerne Festival

results.name: Andris Nelsons/ Royal Concertgebouw Orchestra: Rimsky-Korsakov 'Scheherazade,' Op. 35
